User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the ParkSmart Reserve application.

email.description: The email address of the user.

preferredParkingLocation.description: Preferred parking location of the user.

ParkingSlot.title: ParkingSlot
ParkingSlot.description: Represents a parking slot in the virtual geo-fencing system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the parking slot.

slotNumber.description: The number or identifier of the parking slot within the geo-fenced area.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the parking slot.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the parking slot.

isAvailable.description: Indicates whether the parking slot is currently available.

Reservation.title: Reservation
Reservation.description: Represents a reservation made by a user for a parking slot.

userId.description: The UID of the user who made the reservation.

slotId.description: The ID of the reserved parking slot.

vehiclePlate.description: The license plate of the vehicle.

startTime.description: The start time of the reservation.

endTime.description: The end time of the reservation.

status.description: The current status of the reservation.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the reservation was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the reservation was last updated.

Violation.title: Violation
Violation.description: Represents a parking violation detected by the AI-powered tool.

violationTime.description: The date and time when the violation occurred.

violationType.description: The type of violation (e.g., overstaying, unauthorized parking).

Feedback.title: Feedback
Feedback.description: Represents feedback submitted by a user.

name.description: The name of the user submitting feedback.

rating.description: The rating given by the user.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the feedback was submitted.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data. The 'userId' is the Firebase Authentication UID.

/parkingSlots/{parkingSlotId}.description: Stores parking slot information, including availability status.

/reservations/{reservationId}.description: Stores all reservation data for the application.
